entries.notyet: Who are you? Only loyal soldiers of the Empire should be in here!
entries.waypoint_description_4: You have been ordered to exterminate the Dune Lizards at this location by Pfilbee Jhorn.
entries.waypoint_description_3: You have been ordered to exterminate the Dragonets at this location by Pfilbee Jhorn.
entries.waypoint_description_2: You have been ordered to exterminate the Tatooine Mynocks at this location by Pfilbee Jhorn.
entries.waypoint_description_1: You have been ordered to exterminate the Womp Rats at this location by Pfilbee Jhorn.
entries.return_waypoint_description_4: Return to Pfilbee Jhorn to report that mission is completed.
entries.return_waypoint_description_3: Return to Pfilbee Jhorn to report that mission is completed.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Return to Pfilbee Jhorn to report that mission is completed.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return to Pfilbee Jhorn to report that mission is completed.
entries.next: I don't have the funds to hire you any more. Come see me later.
entries.player_sorry_4: Yes, they're all dead. But... more showed up, so I'll kill them as well.
entries.player_reset_4: No, no more killing these animals!  I'm through with this, you crazy old man!
entries.player_3_4: Where is the forest moon you visited?
entries.player_2_4: No, that's a bit too dangerous.
entries.player_1_4: I'll wipe them from the face of this planet!
entries.npc_work_4: All of the Dune Lizards dead?
entries.npc_reward_4: Good work! Here, take this. Not sure why I saved a painting of that horrible place, can't stand to look at it anyway.
entries.npc_reset_4: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_backtowork_4: Good, good.  You might be an Imperial officer some day!  Tell me when they're all dead, okay?
entries.npc_4_4: You want to go? Heh. Way back when, Imperial Security sent me a duplicate security clearance for Endor by mistake. Tell you what -- you take out these lizards, I'll give you that clearance.
entries.npc_3_4: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_2_4: Good. Check back here after you kill all those lizards.
entries.npc_1_4: Dune lizards. Hate 'em. They think this is their territory. One Imperial officer gets eaten, and suddenly it's my problem. Now it's yours. Kill 'em -- the lizards, not the troops. Don't have any credits left in the budget, but maybe I can work out some other payoff.
entries.player_sorry_3: I am still killing them all.
entries.player_sorry_2: Not yet, but soon.  Soon they will no longer haunt your waking days.
entries.player_reset_3: No, I'm not doing your duty work for you.
entries.player_reset_2: No, I've changed my mind.  They deserve to live just as you and I.  Well... more the
entries.npc_reset_3: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_reset_2: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: They're not the ones that haunt me...
entries.cantwork: Visitor? Ihhh, no idea why. Not much of interest way up here. But go ahead, look around. Watch out for vermin. Don't mess up the place.
entries.npc_reset_1: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Ihh.. now you see why I hate them.  Wipe them from the face of this planet, then tell me when you are triumphant.
entries.player_sorry_1: No, not yet.  They're wily little things.  I'll let you know when they're all gone.
entries.player_reset_1: I can't kill them.  They're too cute.  I can't believe you would dare to have me kill those little furry things.
entries.player_3_3: What did you do after the forest moon mission?
entries.player_3_2: If you were an officer, why are you a custodian now?
entries.player_3_1: Why do you want the womp rats killed?
entries.player_2_2: How could you think of killing those adorable little things.  No, I won't do it.
entries.player_2_1: I'm not a lowly exterminator.  Get some lowlife to do it!
entries.player_1_3: I'll kill them for you, yes.
entries.player_1_2: I like killing mynocks.  Sure, I'll get it done.
entries.player_1_1: Sounds like an easy job.  I'll do it.
entries.npc_reward_3: Good. Dragonets, huh. Let a few of 'em loose on Endor, and the Ewok population would drop pretty dramatically.
entries.npc_reward_2: Good. Mynocks -- lousy vermin, worse than Ewoks. Ihh? What's an Ewok? Never mind, you don't want to know.
entries.npc_reward_1: Nice job. I hope those rats screeched loud as they died. Ihh, me, once an officer, fallen to gloating over dead womp rats! Life's funny.
entries.npc_4_3: Me? After Endor, I got put on lonely duty riding solar focusing mirrors in orbit around Coruscant. Thought that was the worst duty in the galaxy, 'til I got sent here. About those dragonets -- want to kill 'em?
entries.npc_4_2: I was records officer on an Imperial scouting mission to this one forest moon -- place you never heard of. Didn't like the place, and said so. Seems the Emperor himself saw my report. That can end a career fast. Anyway, these mynocks -- will you kill 'em?
entries.npc_4_1: Oh, they get into the water tanks, and -- ihh, I tell a lie. Truth is, I just hate furry things. Empire sent me to some forest moon in the back end of nowhere. Little furry creatures there made trouble all day, every day. Ever since, I like to see furry things die horribly. What about it?
entries.npc_3_3: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_3_2: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_3_1: Ihh, well, pardon me for living. I'm getting back to work.
entries.npc_2_3: Good. Folks say those dragonets are young krayt dragons. Don't know about that, but be careful anyway. Kill 'em and report back here.
entries.npc_2_2: Good. Those mynocks are eating the silica right out of my walls. Blow up their hive, or whatever it is, and check back here for payment.
entries.npc_2_1: Right. I've found where they sleep. Destroy them, then check back here.
entries.npc_1_3: Know those big dragonets? They're prowling around the trash compactors here, growling at the troops. I need 'em dead. That's my life now, lining up pest control. One trip to the forest moon, and poof! Disaster.
entries.npc_1_2: Got more problems with animals -- mynocks, now. Not space mynocks, but the ground-bound Tatooine kind. Not the kind of problem I used to worry about as an Imperial officer, but anyway -- You interested?
entries.npc_1_1: I'm Custodial Officer here. Ihh, fallen a long way from my good days -- never mind. Got problems with womp rats, and I want 'em dead. All of 'em. Got a budget for pest removal, so I can pay. Interested?
